title: Lliswerry A.F.C.
text:
Lliswerry A.F.C. is a <a href="association%20football">football</a> club based in the <a href="Lliswerry">Lliswerry</a> area of the City of <a href="Newport%2C%20Wales">Newport</a>, <a href="South%20Wales">South Wales</a>. They currently play in the <a href="Gwent%20County%20League">Gwent County League</a> although they have in the past played in the <a href="Welsh%20Football%20League">Welsh Football League</a>.
History.
The club was original formed in 1926, but after a break from senior football reformed in 1977, progressing through the divisions of the <a href="Newport%20and%20District%20Football%20League">Newport and District Football League</a>. In the early 1980s the club joined the <a href="Gwent%20County%20League">Gwent County League</a> with promotion to the <a href="Welsh%20Football%20League">Welsh Football League</a> achieved in 2013.
